paragraphs.content: My name is Aayushi Shah. I am from India. I am studying Software Engineering Technology at Centennial College. I want to become an outstanding Software Engineer after completing my course. I want to get a degree from a renowned university after graduating from this course. Other than my field, I like mathematics subject the most.

Reading inspirational books is my hobby. This book WINGS OF FIRE is the best book I have ever read. It is basically the autobiography of APJ Abdul Kalam who was a great person and had been one of the best Presidents of India.
I like to travel to new and exciting places. I like visiting the places which are in the lap of nature. I feel like heaven by travelling such places. I had been to many places such as Kashmir.
I love painting. I like to draw village scenes the most. I have sketched some natural scenes, mostly the sunsets. Painting gives me inner peace.
